channel.title: Could use help asap with connecting hyperion client with server =)
channel.description:
[CODE]Jun 19, 2011 11:41:15 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Jun 19, 2011 11:41:16 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Initiating shutdown hooks... Jun 19, 2011 11:41:16 AM org.hyperion.rs2.util.IoConfigUtil loadConstantsConfig INFO: Reading constants information... Jun 19, 2011 11:41:18 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... Jun 19, 2011 11:41:18 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 9399 object definitions. Jun 19, 2011 11:41:18 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Jun 19, 2011 11:41:19 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Jun 19, 2011 11:41:19 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Jun 19, 2011 11:41:19 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Jun 19, 2011 11:41:22 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 1166825 objects. Jun 19, 2011 11:41:22 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Jun 19, 2011 11:41:22 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loaded 11525 definitions. Jun 19, 2011 11:41:22 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Jun 19, 2011 11:41:23 AM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Jun 19, 2011 11:41:23 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Jun 19, 2011 11:41:23 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Ready # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: requested 4092 bytes for char in C:\BUILD_AREA\jdk 6_24\hotspot\src\share\vm\utilities\stack.inline.hpp. Out of swap space? # # Internal Error (allocation.inline.hpp:39), pid=5488, tid=4120 # Error: char in C:\BUILD_AREA\jdk6_24\hotspot\src\share\vm\utilities\stack.inl ine.hpp # # JRE version: 6.0_24-b07 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (19.1-b02 mixed mode windows-x86 ) # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Documents and Settings\user\Desktop\Hyperion\Server\hs_err_pid5488.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # [url=http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp]HotSpot Virtual Machine Error Reporting Page[/url] # Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]
I get this when I'm trying to connect Hyperion client with the server. Someone mind helping me out?
Thanks.

item.title: Could use help asap with connecting hyperion client with server =)
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Sorry but where is that located? Sorry it took so long to respond, was at lunch.

EDIT:

Do you mean this?:

@echo off @title iServer java -Xms1024m -Xmx1024m -XX:MaxPermSize=128m -Xss256K -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar org.hyperion.Server pause exit

Read full topic
item.source: Could use help asap with connecting hyperion client with server =)
